trans-unit.source: Represents a combo box that is used in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示使用中的下拉式方塊<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows examples of RibbonComboBox controls that have images and labels, that just have images, and that just have labels.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示 RibbonComboBox 控制項有影像和索引標籤，只具有映像，且只包含標籤的範例。

trans-unit.source: ![Ribbon combo box controls](~/add/media/wpfribbon-combobox.png "Ribbon combo box controls") Ribbon combo box controls The following illustration shows a RibbonComboBox when the drop-down is opened.
trans-unit.target: ![功能區下拉式方塊控制項](~/add/media/wpfribbon-combobox.png "功能區下拉式方塊控制項")功能區下拉式方塊控制項，如下圖所示 RibbonComboBox 開啟下拉式清單時。

trans-unit.source: ![Ribbon combo box control with drop-down open](~/add/media/wpfribbon-combobox-selection.png "Ribbon combo box control with drop-down open") Ribbon combo box control with drop-down open
trans-unit.target: ![開啟功能區下拉式方塊控制項下拉式清單](~/add/media/wpfribbon-combobox-selection.png "開啟功能區下拉式方塊控制項下拉式清單")開啟功能區下拉式方塊控制項下拉式清單

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Unloads the container for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 卸載指定的項目容器。

trans-unit.source: This method undoes the effects of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.PrepareContainerForItemOverride%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可復原的效果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.PrepareContainerForItemOverride%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.PrepareContainerForItemOverride%2A>

trans-unit.source: The element that is used to display the item.
trans-unit.target: 用來顯示項目項目。

trans-unit.source: The item to display from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the content of the combo box can be edited.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否可編輯的下拉式方塊的內容。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the content of the combo box can be edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果下拉式方塊的內容可供編輯。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.IsEditable*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.IsEditable*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.IsEditable*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether selection-only mode is enabled, in which the contents of the combo box are selectable but not editable.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的值，指出是否已啟用選取範圍僅限模式，但不可編輯，並下拉式方塊的內容。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the contents of the combo box are selectable but not editable; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the contents of the combo box are not selectable and not editable.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果下拉式方塊的內容是可選取但無法編輯。<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果下拉式方塊的內容不是可選取和無法編輯。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.IsReadOnly*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.IsReadOnly*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.IsReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 當按下 KeyTip 或加速鍵時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Contains data about the activation.
trans-unit.target: 包含啟動有關的資料。

trans-unit.source: Builds the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox"></xref> when a new template is applied.
trans-unit.target: 建置的視覺化樹狀結構<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox"></xref>套用新的範本時。

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用，每當應用程式程式碼或內部處理序，例如重建配置傳遞，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 建立新<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonComboBoxAutomationPeer"></xref>物件對這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: A new automation peer object for this control.
trans-unit.target: 新自動化對等物件對這個控制項。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged> event data.
trans-unit.target: 此實作不會變更處理的狀態 (<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性) 的<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged>事件資料。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsKeyboardFocusWithinChanged> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Invoked when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 時叫用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>屬性變更。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: Information about the change.
trans-unit.target: 變更的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is accessed.
trans-unit.target: 當存取 KeyTip 或加速鍵時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Contains data about the activation.
trans-unit.target: 包含啟動有關的資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewKeyDown"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewKeyDown"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseDown"></xref> routed event.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseDown"></xref>路由的事件。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> routed attached event.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>路由的附加的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: This implementation marks the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> event as handled by setting the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the event data to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會將標示<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>事件，如藉由設定處理<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性的事件資料至`true`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not call the base implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此實作不會呼叫基底實作。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Prepares the specified element to display the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 準備指定的項目，以顯示指定的項目。

trans-unit.source: The element that is used to display the item.
trans-unit.target: 用來顯示項目項目。

trans-unit.source: The item to display from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*> collection.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示的項目<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the item that is displayed in the selection box.
trans-unit.target: 取得選取範圍 方塊中顯示的項目。

trans-unit.source: The item that is displayed in the selection box.
trans-unit.target: 選取方塊中顯示的項目。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is an <xref:System.String.Empty> string.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref:System.String.Empty>字串。</xref:System.String.Empty>

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets a composite string that specifies how to format the selected item in the selection box if it is displayed as a string.
trans-unit.target: 取得複合字串，指定如何格式化選取方塊中選取的項目，如果它顯示為字串。

trans-unit.target: 複合字串，指定如何格式化選取方塊中選取的項目，如果它顯示為字串。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the text box that displays the selected item in the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定下拉式方塊中顯示選取的項目文字方塊的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The SelectionBoxWidth property does not include the widths of the image and label that are associated with the combo box.
trans-unit.target: SelectionBoxWidth 屬性不包含下拉式方塊相關聯的映像和標籤的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The width of the text box that displays the selected item in the combo box.
trans-unit.target: 選取的項目顯示在下拉式方塊中的文字方塊的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值為 0.0。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否要顯示此控制項的視覺化鍵盤焦點。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要顯示鍵盤焦點視覺;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.ShowKeyboardCues*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.ShowKeyboardCues*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a combo box that is open and displays a drop-down control will remain open when a user clicks the selection box.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已開啟並顯示下拉式清單控制項的下拉式方塊會保持開啟狀態當使用者按一下選取方塊。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to keep the drop-down control open when the user clicks the text area to start editing; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>將下拉式清單控制項中，開啟當使用者按一下文字區域，以開始編輯;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.StaysOpenOnEdit*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.StaysOpenOnEdit*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.StaysOpenOnEdit*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the currently selected item.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前選取項目的文字。

trans-unit.source: When there is no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.SelectionBoxItem%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.IsEditable%2A> is `true`, this property represents the text entered in the text box.
trans-unit.target: 當沒有任何<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.SelectionBoxItem%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.IsEditable%2A>是`true`，這個屬性代表在文字方塊中輸入的文字。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.IsEditable%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.SelectionBoxItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.IsEditable%2A> is `false`, this property represents the string version of the selected item.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.IsEditable%2A>是`false`，這個屬性表示選取的項目之的字串版本。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.IsEditable%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The text of the item that is displayed in the selection box.
trans-unit.target: 顯示選取方塊中選取之項目的文字。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is an <xref:System.String> string.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref:System.String>字串。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonComboBox.Text*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
